Smart Air Conditioning: Create an air conditioner with a built-in Wi-Fi or Bluetooth connection that can be controlled and monitored remotely through a smartphone app, allowing users to adjust settings from anywhere.
Air Purification: Incorporate an air purification system into the air conditioner, filtering out allergens and pollutants, improving indoor air quality.
Dehumidification: Design an air conditioner that can also function as a dehumidifier, reducing humidity and preventing mold growth in damp environments.
Energy Harvesting: Develop an air conditioner that uses solar or wind energy to power its operation, reducing its carbon footprint and energy costs.
Eco-Friendly Cooling: Implement a system that utilizes a refrigerant made from natural, non-toxic materials, reducing the environmental impact of air conditioning.
